SEARCH
Package netApi

Class NetworkUtil

java.lang.Object
netApi.NetworkUtil
public class NetworkUtil extends Object
Util class for handling ip addresses, ports, and NetworkInterfaces. This can be used to generate and process codes representing IP addresses and ports, as well as manage NetworkInterface used for communication.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static String
    genCode(InetAddress ip, int port)
    Turns an ip address and a port into a code for client use when connecting to a server.
    static String
    genCode(InetSocketAddress add)
    Turns a InetSocketAddress into a code.
    static NetworkInterface
    getUsableInterface()
    Return's the NetworkInterface used for multicasting and general networking.

    Turns a code into an InetSocketAddress.

  • Method Details

    • genCode

      public static String genCode(InetAddress ip, int port)
      Turns an ip address and a port into a code for client use when connecting to a server. The code can be turned back to an ip address and port through processCode(String).
      Parameters:
      ip - Ip address used to generate code
      port - Port used to generate code
      Returns:
      Code version of ip address and port

    • genCode

      public static String genCode(InetSocketAddress add)
      Turns a InetSocketAddress into a code. The code can be turned back to an ip address and port through processCode(String).
      Parameters:
      add - InetSocketAddress used to generate code
      Returns:
      Code version of InetSocketAddress

    • processCode

      public static InetSocketAddress processCode(String code) throws UnknownHostException
      Turns a code into an InetSocketAddress. The code must have been created through genCode(InetSocketAddress) or genCode(InetAddress, int).
      Parameters:
      code - Code version of ip address
      Returns:
      Ip address and port generated from code
      Throws:
      UnknownHostException - If code is invalid

    • getUsableInterface

      public static NetworkInterface getUsableInterface() throws SocketException
      Return's the NetworkInterface used for multicasting and general networking. While you will likely never use this it is here for your convenience.
      Returns:
      The NetworkInterface used for multicasting and general networking
      Throws:
      SocketException - If an I/O error occurs or there are no usable NetworkInterfaces
